job_title: Oracle Cloud PPM BA/Production Support Consultant
jd: From: Shubham sharma, VyzeInc shubhams@vyzeinc.com Reply to: shubhams@vyzeinc.com Oracle Cloud PPM BA/Production Support Consultant ( W2 ) Remote USC/GC onlySkypeJD* 3-5 years of hands-on functional experience with Oracle Project Portfolio Management (PPM).* Solid understanding of Oracle Cloud financials modules that interface to Oracle PPM.* Working experience and understanding of all phases of the application support and software development life cycle.* Working knowledge of data extracts and updates within single or multiple tables.* Consultant will lead production support of the Oracle Cloud PPM application, NOT implementing the application.* Someone that will be hands on with user, capturing specifications, documenting, etc. and not something that is leading the implementation of the module within Oracle
